northernRealms.title: Blue Stripes Commando
northernRealms.text: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly, though, I kill for her.

northernRealms.title: Catapult
northernRealms.text: The Gods help those who have better catapults.

northernRealms.title: Cinfrid Reavers Dragon Hunter
northernRealms.text: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.

northernRealms.title: Esterad Thyssen
northernRealms.text: Like all Thyssen men, he was tall, powerfully built and criminally handsome

northernRealms.title: Foltest Lord Commander of the North
northernRealms.text: Sod advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in  my soldiers' blades.

northernRealms.title: Foltest the Siegemaster
northernRealms.text: A well-aimed ballista razes not just the enemy's walls, but his morale as well.

northernRealms.title: John Natalis
northernRealms.text: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

northernRealms.title: Phillippa Eilhart
northernRealms.text: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.

northernRealms.title: Poor Fucking Infantry
northernRealms.text: I's a war veteran! ... spare me a crown?
